section.title: How to Change the Resolution for Vector Images
section.p: This technique will change the size of all vector images (such as PDF or SVG) and will not affect raster images.
Vector images are rendered with a default resolution of 96dpi. You can change this default value by setting the image.resolution transformation parameter to another value (from 72, 120, 300 and 600).
